sentences.en: A myriad of stars surround the moon.
Armed police surrounded a house in the High Street.
sentences.cn: 武装警察包围了大街上的一栋房子。

sentences.en: Clearing a surround to the orchard, will significantly reduce background pollination to very low levels.
sentences.cn: 在种子园周围只要清除出一条隔离带, 便可显著地使外来传粉减到最低水平.

sentences.en: For example, the surround module might use the echo module.
sentences.cn: 例如, surround模块可能会引用echo模块.

sentences.en: He certainly would be willing to surround her with little offices of compromising kindness.
sentences.cn: 他将愿意用仁慈的让步对她略加照料.

sentences.en: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.cn: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

sentences.en: He had made it his business to surround himself with a hand-picked group of bright young officers.
sentences.cn: 他总会亲手挑选一批聪明而年轻的军官常伴他左右。

sentences.en: He likes to surround himself with amusing people.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢让自己身边拥着有趣的人们.

sentences.en: Hundreds of steps lead to the high walls which surround the president's palace!
sentences.cn: 数百级台阶通向总统府周围的高墙.

sentences.en: I wondered why it was that he had managed to surround himself with idiots.
sentences.cn: 我弄不清楚为什么他一直费尽心机地让一些白痴呆在自己身边.

sentences.en: In the future, the smartness of computers will surround you.
sentences.cn: 将来, 你身边环绕的都是电脑的精明.

sentences.en: Its rings were discovered by telescope from Earth, but space probes later found that spectacular rings surround some other planets.
sentences.cn: 它的圆环是从地球上用望远镜发现的，但是太空探测器后来又发现了围绕其他一些星球的壮观的圆环。

sentences.en: The attachment region may surround an orifice in the fluid ejector substrate.
sentences.cn: 该附着区域可以围绕该流体喷射器衬底中的孔.

sentences.en: The controversies , instead, surround efforts to improve the slums.
sentences.cn: 取而代之的是, 努力改善贫民窟的争论.

sentences.en: They try to use the wire netting to surround the garden.
sentences.cn: 他们试用铁丝网把花园围起来.

sentences.en: Thus , the surround module can simply use or.
sentences.cn: 因此surround模块可以简单的调用或者.

trans.tran_cn: 围绕，包围，与…密切相关，喜欢结交
trans.tran_en: to be all around someone or something on every side
to be all around someone or something on every side
